title: So Sick
lyrics:
[intro]
(Em)  (C)  (G)  (D)   x2
(Em)Tududu  (C)dudu  (G)tudu  (D)du   x2
 
Gotta change my (Em)answering ma(C)chine
(G)Now that I'm a(D)lone
Cuz right (Em)now it says that (C)we
(G)Can't come to the (D)phone
And I (Em)know it makes no (C)sense
Cuz (G)you walked out the (D) door
But it's the (C)only way I hear your voice anymore
 
[pre-chorus]
(Em)(It's ridi(C)culous)
It's been (G)months and for some (D)reason I just
(Em)(Can't get over (C)us) And I'm (G)stronger than (D)this
(Em)(Enough is e(C)nough) No more (G)walkin round, with (D)my head down
(C)I'm so over being blue, cryin over you
 
[chorus]
And I'm (Em)so sick of (C)love songs, (G)so tired of (D)tears
(Em)So done with (C)wishing (G)you were still (D)here
Said I'm (Em)so sick of (C)love songs, (G)so sad and (D)slow
So (C)why can't I turn off the radio?
 
Gotta fix that (Em)calender I (C)have
That's (G)marked July (D)15th
Because (Em)since there's no more (C)you
There's no more (G)anniversa(D)ry
I'm so (Em)fed up with my (C)thoughts of you
(G)And your memo(D)ry
And how (C)every song reminds me of what used to be
 
[chorus]
And I'm (Em)so sick of (C)love songs, (G)so tired of (D)tears
(Em)So done with (C)wishing (G)you were still (D)here
Said I'm (Em)so sick of (C)love songs, (G)so sad and (D)slow
So (C)why can't I turn off the radio?
 
[bridge]
(D)(Leave me a(C)lone) Leave me alone
(D)(Stupid love (C)songs)
Don’t make me (D)think about her smile
Or (C)having my first child
Let it (D)go, turning (C-one slam strum)off the radio
 
[chorus]
And I'm (Em)so sick of (C)love songs, (G)so tired of (D)tears
(Em)So done with (C)wishing (G)you were still (D)here
Said I'm (Em)so sick of (C)love songs, (G)so sad and (D)slow
So (C)why can't I turn off the radio?
 
[chorus again!]
And I'm (Em)so sick of (C)love songs, (G)so tired of (D)tears
(Em)So done with (C)wishing (G)you were still (D)here
Said I'm (Em)so sick of (C)love songs, (G)so sad and (D)slow
So (C)why can't I turn off the radio?
(C)Why can't I turn off the radio?
(C)Why can't I turn off the radio…
(C-single strum) [end]
